org.rlcommunity.environments.mountaincar
Class MountainCarState

java.lang.Object
  org.rlcommunity.environments.mountaincar.MountainCarState

public class MountainCarState
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all of the problem parameters, current state variables, and state transition and reward dynamics.
